title: Retro Game Engine
description: A pixel-perfect 2D game engine built with WebGL and TypeScript. Features sprite animation, collision detection, and a retro tile-based map system.

title: Neon City Builder
description: A voxel-based city builder with retro neon aesthetics. Build and customize your cyberpunk metropolis with procedurally generated buildings.

title: Pixel Art Studio
description: An online pixel art editor with palette management, animation tools, and export to multiple formats. Perfect for creating retro game sprites.

title: Synthwave Visualizer
description: A music visualizer that generates retro synthwave visuals in real-time. Features multiple visualization modes and customizable color schemes.
